description.narrative: INTERNATIONAL PARTNERSHIPS PROGRAM - UNDER THIS PROGRAM, SHIFT WORKS COLLABORATIVELY WITH INTERGOVERNMENTAL INSTITUTIONS, INDUSTRY AND SPORT ASSOCIATIONS AND MULTISTAKEHOLDER INITIATIVES THAT SUPPORT IMPLEMENTATION OF THE GUIDING PRINCIPLES. WE HELP THESE ORGANIZATIONS TO DEVELOP PRACTICAL GUIDANCE ON SPECIFIC HUMAN RIGHTS TOPICS, REFINE THEIR EXISTING STANDARDS AND PRACTICES, OR ENGAGE IN DIALOGUE WITH DIFFERENT STAKEHOLDER GROUPS AND STRENGTHEN THEIR EXISTING STANDARDS AND PRACTICES. WE ALSO LEAD COLLABORATIVE PROJECTS WITH DIFFERENT STAKEHOLDER GROUPS TO DRIVE LEADING APPROACHES IN AREAS LIKE CORPORATE HUMAN RIGHTS DISCLOSURE AND IMPACT EVALUATION.
